Context

We have horrible vocabularies.

We wanted to start an art review website but quickly realized we don't quite have the vocabulary, skill or general art history knowledge to do a proper critique. In desperation we've opted for creative writing.

We're looking for collaborators if this looks like something you might be in to.

Email us at context (at) txetnoc (dot) com.

A Secret Art Email!

Sign up and we will send you emails about the stuff we post, probably around once a month.
